name: Spiced Oat Almond Gluten-free Cake, in Strawberry Nuts Goji berry parfait
description: This recipe for Spiced Oat Almond Gluten-free Cake is perfect in this parfait. Vegan GF gum-free parfait-2B084
recipeIngredient: 3.5 Tbsps raw sugar or equivalent sweetener
1/8 teaspoon each of ginger and cloves powder

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl whisk the oil, water, agave, sugar, vinegar and flaxmeal till well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl whisk the oil, water, agave, sugar, vinegar and flaxmeal till well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl whisk all the dry ingredients and add to the wet mix.
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl whisk all the dry ingredients and add to the wet mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the batter in a parchment lined pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the batter in a parchment lined pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake all the batter, or keep 2 Tablespoons for the pink top(optional).
recipeInstructions.name: Bake all the batter, or keep 2 Tablespoons for the pink top(optional).

recipeInstructions.text: Mix 2 Tablespoons of the mix with 2 teaspoons beet puree and 1 Tablespoons oats flour. Pour this in top of the batter.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix 2 Tablespoons of the mix with 2 teaspoons beet puree and 1 Tablespoons oats flour. Pour this in top of the batter.

recipeInstructions.text: Spread it on the top and bake at preheated 375 degrees F for 25-30 minutes or until a tooth pick from the center comes out almost clean
recipeInstructions.name: Spread it on the top and bake at preheated 375 degrees F for 25-30 minutes or until a tooth pick from the center comes out almost clean

recipeInstructions.text: Remove cake from pan carefully. Let cool for 10 minutes before slicing.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove cake from pan carefully. Let cool for 10 minutes before slicing.

itemListElement.text: Layer the a piece of the cake that fit into the serving glass.
itemListElement.name: Layer the a piece of the cake that fit into the serving glass.

itemListElement.text: Top it with chopped strawberries or fruit of choice, some chopped walnuts or other nuts and dried goji berries.
itemListElement.name: Top it with chopped strawberries or fruit of choice, some chopped walnuts or other nuts and dried goji berries.

itemListElement.text: Top this layer with plain Coconut milk or other non dairy yogurt. For a more dessert version, add a little agave or raw sugar and spices of choice to the yogurt(I used SoDelicious plain coconut milk yogurt with a little ginger powder, cinnamon and raw sugar mixed in for just a hint of sweet and spice)
itemListElement.name: Top this layer with plain Coconut milk or other non dairy yogurt. For a more dessert version, add a little agave or raw sugar and spices of choice to the yogurt(I used SoDelicious plain coconut milk yogurt with a little ginger powder, cinnamon and raw sugar mixed in for just a hint of sweet and spice)

itemListElement.text: Top this layer with the cake, then fruit, nuts, yogurt and continue layering.
itemListElement.name: Top this layer with the cake, then fruit, nuts, yogurt and continue layering.

keywords: gluten free cake, spiced cake, vegan cake recipe
